name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Angular Engineer with 8 years of full stack development experience focusing on **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Angular** technologies. Proficient in Agile methodologies, I have a proven track record of building high-performance solutions within the healthcare and financial sectors. My technical expertise encompasses frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**, alongside backend technologies like **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, ensuring robust application development.
My experience with cloud services such as **Azure** and **AWS** enhances my ability to deliver scalable enterprise-grade applications. I possess strong foundations in developing and implementing **Clean Code** practices and leveraging testing frameworks to ensure quality deliverables in line with business requirements. Fluent in English, I excel in collaborative environments, driving projects with a focus on continuous improvement and software compliance standards.
